TopicTitle: See kerbonauts inside the cockpit and active hatches

Articles.Content:
How cool it would be if you could look through the MK1 window and see Jeb in there?

What i am asking is to be abble to see the crew members from outside the ship, and maybe have a dynamic hatch which would open for EVA

I don't know if active hatches is feasible because most of them don't fit the helmet, but i wouldn't see a problem if collisions were be ignored until the kerbonault was outside the ship

This would add a lot to the game, we all know that physicsless bodies inside a copckit won't touch the game performance

If the hatch thing is not doable, at least internal vision, we don't lag out just by driving from IVA
